Hulman & Company selling Indianapolis Motor Speedway, IndyCar Series a

04 Nov 2019


INDIANAPOLIS (AP) - Hulman & Company selling Indianapolis Motor Speedway, IndyCar Series and other properties to Penske Entertainment Corp.
